description: Used to override a stage condition. For more information about conditions, see Stage conditions and How do stage conditions work?.

parameters.name: pipelineName
parameters.description: The name of the pipeline with the stage that will override the condition.

parameters.name: stageName
parameters.description: The name of the stage for the override.

parameters.name: pipelineExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the pipeline execution for the override.

parameters.name: conditionType
parameters.description: The type of condition to override for the stage, such as entry conditions, failure conditions, or success conditions.
